name: I adopted my Shar Pei car magnet
description:
"I adopted my Shar Pei" car magnet can be easily moved about on your car to ensure there is no sun damage residue.

This Magnet is the perfect way to show your support for Shar Pei Rescue Inc!

Features:

Paw Prints "Run" Up and Down the Ribbon
The Word "Shar-Pei" in the Middle of the Ribbon Magnet
The Words "I Adopted My" in Script Lettering at the Top of the Magnet
White Background with Black Lettering and Paw Prints
Measures approximately 20.3cms (8 Inches) 

Let the world know you adopted your pei!

name: Comfy Cone
description:
The Comfy Cone, a healing halo of love for your pet, developed by All Four Paws in the USA.  Medium (neck size 30-37.5cm, neck to snout 20cm), 

Better that the plastic Elizabethan collar, The Comfy Cone is made from nylon fabric laminated onto ½” foam making it soft and yielding while remaining very sturdy and protective, with its solid material your pet will no longer be chasing “ghosts” in their peripheral vision, making them much more relaxed so they can heal quicker. The Comfy Cone can be folded back to allow pets to eat and drink in comfort, or to allow checking of wounds, is water resistant and wipes clean easily. With its reflective binding you will never loose you pet in the dark again and, if you feel The Comfy Cone is a little too plain for your dog you can jazz it up with waterproof markers. 
 
The Comfy Cone came into existence when Sabre refused to wear a plastic Elizabethan collar however he needed something to prevent him from getting to his damaged tail, desperate for a better solution his owners made a collar from a foam exercise mat. From these humble beginnings, and with Sabre’s vets advice and encouragement, The Comfy Cone was developed. Once the design was considered ideal it was rigorously tested using some of America’s vets worse Elizabethan collar patients, when The Comfy Cone could stand up to the worst of these dogs without damage it was then produced for all animals to be able to heal in comfort. The Comfy Cone has been well and truly veterinary tested and approved and works in America, now it is available to Australian pets to make their journey back to perfect health much easier.
 
****Other sizes available upon request

name: Pet Life Vet Bed Gold
description:
127cm x 76 cm (50" x 30")  

Pet Life Bed GoldVetbed Gold, available colours: Blue, White, Red, Grey. Approx Sizes: 45cmx35cm(18"x14"), 66cmx50cm(26"x20"), 93cmx71cm(37"x28"), 127cmx76cm (50"x30") Vetbed® Original has been on the market now for over 20 years, and is still the UK’s market leading veterinary pet bedding. With it’s green backing, the Vetbed® name on the back or on the ironed on washing instructions label you know you have one of the most versatile vet bed bedding products in the world. Very long lasting – customers tell us Vetbed® last and lasts Machine washable – over and over again at up to 90ºC Thicker pile – for greater heat retention Double woven – makes it harder to chew Portable – use it at home or when travelling Recommended by vets – the beds they use the most Drains and dries fast – keeps your pets warm and dry even if accidents happen Pets and their owners love Vetbed because it is so warm, comfortable, inviting & very convenient, the readers of Your Dog magazine voted it the Best Dog Bed (in the UK); it is suitable for use with Dogs & Cats of any age whether in the home or travelling. Vetbed is recommended and widely used by UK vets; they find the fabric the safest and most effective ever produced for use in conjunction with veterinary medicine, surgery and general animal welfare. In spite of its luxurious real fur feel, it has tremendous strength and durability because it’s made with double strength polyester. This high density of fibres not only provides extreme comfort for your pet; it also means the bedding retains heat by trapping air, keeping your pet warm and cosy all year round. Vetbed is suitable for whelping & kittening. Older animals are also able to achieve a higher degree of comfort and mobility as the constant warmth is a great advantage to ageing muscles and joints. The unique drainage properties of Vetbed means that if your pet has an “accident” it will drain straight through the bed, leaving the top surface and your pet dry. This bedding is also invaluable for any animal recovering from illness or surgery; it helps reduce pressure & friction and keeps body temperature normal whilst keeping your pet comfortable, thereby reducing the risk of hypothermia. Petlife International was formed in 1993 by a management buy-out of Vetbed (Animal Care) Ltd & Harkers and has become UK’s leading provider of quality pet bedding; they have been at the forefront of providing these products to both professional and domestic pet owners since, they pride themselves on delivering great customer service, coupled with a growing & innovative product range.

name: Slow feed bowl 38cm
description:
Dog Dish Flying Saucer Stainless Steel 



FLYING SAUCER 38CM 

Keep Mr & Miss Piggy from devouring their meals with this flying saucer dish. The stainless steel dish designed to ensure feed time is a slower feed process rather than a "gone in 60 seconds" action. 

This design works as the risen part in the middle of the dish stops the food going into the middle of the bowl, the dogs can take their food from the side of the dish ensuring that feed time take more "work" than just in, out and gone!
